sn3.25:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn3.25:4.3: “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divā divassā”ti?
sn3.25:4.4: “Yāni tāni, bhante, raññaṃ khattiyānaṃ muddhāvasittānaṃ issariyamadamattānaṃ kāmagedhapariyuṭṭhitānaṃ janapadatthāvariyappattānaṃ mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasantānaṃ rājakaraṇīyāni bhavanti, tesu khvāhaṃ, etarahi ussukkamāpanno”ti.
sn3.25:5.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, idha te puriso āgaccheyya puratthimāya disāya saddhāyiko paccayiko.
sn3.25:5.3: ‘yagghe, mahārāja, jāneyyāsi, ahaṃ āgacchāmi puratthimāya disāya.
sn3.25:5.4: Tatthaddasaṃ mahantaṃ pabbataṃ abbhasamaṃ, sabbe pāṇe nippothento āgacchati.
sn3.25:5.5: Yaṃ te, mahārāja, karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohī’ti.
sn3.25:5.6: Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya pacchimāya disāya … pe …
sn3.25:5.7: atha tatiyo puriso āgaccheyya uttarāya disāya …
sn3.25:5.8: atha catuttho puriso āgaccheyya dakkhiṇāya disāya saddhāyiko paccayiko.
sn3.25:5.10: ‘yagghe, mahārāja, jāneyyāsi, ahaṃ āgacchāmi dakkhiṇāya disāya.
sn3.25:5.11: Tatthaddasaṃ mahantaṃ pabbataṃ abbhasamaṃ sabbe pāṇe nippothento āgacchati.
sn3.25:5.12: Yaṃ te, mahārāja, karaṇīyaṃ taṃ karohī’ti.
sn3.25:5.13: Evarūpe te, mahārāja, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne dāruṇe manussakkhaye dullabhe manussatte kimassa karaṇīyan”ti?
sn3.25:6.1: “Evarūpe me, bhante, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne dāruṇe manussakkhaye dullabhe manussatte kimassa karaṇīyaṃ aññatra dhammacariyāya aññatra samacariyāya aññatra kusalakiriyāya aññatra puññakiriyāyā”ti?
sn3.25:7.1: “Ārocemi kho te, mahārāja, paṭivedemi kho te, mahārāja, adhivattati kho taṃ, mahārāja, jarāmaraṇaṃ.
sn3.25:7.2: Adhivattamāne ce te, mahārāja, jarāmaraṇe kimassa karaṇīyan”ti?
sn3.25:7.3: “Adhivattamāne ca me, bhante, jarāmaraṇe kimassa karaṇīyaṃ aññatra dhammacariyāya samacariyāya kusalakiriyāya puññakiriyāya?
sn3.25:7.4: Yāni tāni, bhante, raññaṃ khattiyānaṃ muddhāvasittānaṃ issariyamadamattānaṃ kāmagedhapariyuṭṭhitānaṃ janapadatthāvariyappattānaṃ mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasantānaṃ hatthiyuddhāni bhavanti;
sn3.25:7.5: tesampi, bhante, hatthiyuddhānaṃ natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamāne jarāmaraṇe.
sn3.25:7.6: Yānipi tāni, bhante, raññaṃ khattiyānaṃ muddhāvasittānaṃ … pe …
sn3.25:7.10: tesampi, bhante, pattiyuddhānaṃ natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamāne jarāmaraṇe.
sn3.25:7.11: Santi kho pana, bhante, imasmiṃ rājakule mantino mahāmattā, ye pahonti āgate paccatthike mantehi bhedayituṃ.
sn3.25:7.12: Tesampi, bhante, mantayuddhānaṃ natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamāne jarāmaraṇe.
sn3.25:7.13: Saṃvijjati kho pana, bhante, imasmiṃ rājakule pahūtaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ bhūmigatañceva vehāsaṭṭhañca, yena mayaṃ pahoma āgate paccatthike dhanena upalāpetuṃ.
sn3.25:7.14: Tesampi, bhante, dhanayuddhānaṃ natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamāne jarāmaraṇe.
sn3.25:7.15: Adhivattamāne ca me, bhante, jarāmaraṇe kimassa karaṇīyaṃ aññatra dhammacariyāya samacariyāya kusalakiriyāya puññakiriyāyā”ti?
sn3.25:8.2: Adhivattamāne jarāmaraṇe kimassa karaṇīyaṃ aññatra dhammacariyāya samacariyāya kusalakiriyāya puññakiriyāyā”ti?
sn3.25:10.2: adhivattanti pāṇine;
sn3.25:10.5: Na kiñci parivajjeti,
sn3.25:13.1: Yo dhammaṃ cari kāyena,
sn3.25:15.2: issattaṃ pabbatūpamā;
